name: SpaceRanger - On the way to Mars
name_original: SpaceRanger - On the way to Mars
description:
Year 2200. Global climate changes made life on the earth almost impossible ☠️ 

Humanity takes the resources to send expedition to the Mars - the last chance to survive.

The way to the mars has lots of dangerous like asteroids. You - the brave space ranger was choose to find and destroy all asteroids on the way.

For each destroyed asteroid you will get generous reward from the united space government of the last nations. 

Find and destroy all asteroid, save the humanity ✊🚀💥
